x field desc: Marked X-coordinate values, with the component's bottom-left corner coordinates being (0,0).
y field desc: Marked Y-coordinate values, with the component's bottom-left corner coordinates being (0,0).
map background image desc: Please select a PNG or SVG image as the map.
xAxis min desc: Minimum value for the X coordinate
xAxis max desc: Maximum value for the X coordinate
yAxis min desc: Minimum value for the Y coordinate
yAxis max desc: Maximum value for the Y coordinate
